mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (isbn, title, author, totalAmount, currentAmount) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{author}, #{totalAmount}, #{currentAmount})
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET title=#{title}, author=#{author}, totalAmount=#{totalAmount}, currentAmount=#{currentAmount} WHERE isbn = #{isbn}
mapper.select: SELECT isbn, title, author, totalAmount, currentAmount FROM book WHERE isbn like CONCAT('%', #{isbn}, '%')
